University of Maine/New Hampshire Sea Grant
Marine Law Institute, University of Southern Maine School of Law

Territorial Sea is a publication of the Marine Law Institute of the University of Maine School of Law. Papers in this issue include: Granite Rock Co. v. California Coastal Commission: with friends like this, who needs enemies?; Supreme Court finds OCS is not "In Alaska"; California wins appeal of thresher shark consistency decision; and Appeals Court upholds Delaware's coastal law.
